title: Suomi Sans, a differerent sans.
content:
This is different from other sans serif fonts, and the difference is with the counters.

Can you see the difference?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130421071359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stf_SuomiSans_poster_3973.png)

Have you seen this kind of sans before?

author: Tomi from Suomi

comments.content: Hi, Isaac. Your hometown has a very Bentonesque name. And moi to you too ;·)
